ModMetaData.name: CaveBiome
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds a new biome: cave. This will allow you to explore and settle into the deep tunnels of this Rimworld. WARNING! Caveworld Flora must be enabled BEFORE this mod! See the forum thread for content/changelog and related mods. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=13172.msg133449#msg133449
